data.name: Apparitions
data.detailed_description:
Apparitions is a multiplayer co-op psychological horror game for 1-4 players. Figure out how to connect to the other side and gather enough evidence of the paranormal to correctly identify it. Find the objects that the ghost is connected to and, using the items, determine the best way to exorcise the ghost and banish it completely or help it pass to the other side peacefully. Be careful of what you decide. It may be the last decision you ever make.

Gameplay

The overall objective is to get rid of the apparition lurking inside the business or home that you're investigating. Figure out what area the ghost is haunting on the property and find out how to communicate with it. It will only communicate with you either by spirit box, Ouija board, or voice recorder. Gather the four pieces of evidence it leaves behind to determine what type of ghost it is. After figuring out what you're dealing with, you'll need to perform an exorcism to banish it from existence or perform an exorcism that frees it to the other side. To do this, though, you'll have to find the two objects that the ghost has a connection with and use them accordingly to exorcise it correctly.

Multiplayer

Apparitions support 1-4 players. Play solo, team up with a group of friends, or play in a public lobby and make new friends.

The Ghosts

We have 11 different ghosts, each with their own unique personalities, ready for you to investigate. Each will give off four pieces of evidence in order for you to figure out what the ghost is.

Evidence

Rempod, Writing, Laser Grid, Ghost Orbs, Freezing, Ectoplasm, EMF 4, EMF 5, Scratches & Cat Toy

data.short_description: Apparitions is a 4 player co-op ghost hunting game. Figure out how to communicate with the other side. Use the equipment to find out what type of ghost you and your team are dealing with and determine how to exorcise it accordingly.

  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2600
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Integrated Graphics or GTX 660+
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10240 MB available space
